articles.content: FOXBOROUGH, Mass. The New England Patriots announced today that former defensive lineman Richard Seymour has been voted by the fans as the 30th inductee into the Patriots Hall of Fame. Seymour joins Troy Brown (2012), Tedy Bruschi (2013), Kevin Faulk (2016), … [+3705 chars]

articles.description: The Dallas Cowboys could rescind the franchise tag and go with Andy Dalton at quarterback if Dak Prescott doesn’t sign soon.
articles.content:
Well this is an interesting option.
As the Dallas Cowboys and quarterback Dak Prescott stare each other down in contract negotiations, team owner Jerry Jones and his son, Stephen, have a trap door option that could be considered: Rescinding the tag.
